pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, July 22, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Queens County, Prince Edward Island

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with local families. Minister of Veterans Affairs and Associate Minister of National Defence Lawrence MacAulay will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

Prince County, Prince Edward Island

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with local fishers.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
